feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-03-26T00:16:56.843156Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;影响奶牛的疾病被确认为高致病性禽流感</stitle>; <id>;https://www.agweb.com/news/livestock/dairy/writing-mystery-illness -impacting-texas-kansas-dairy-cattle-confirmed-highly</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T23:32:31.138500Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.agweb.com/ news/livestock/dairy/writing-mystery-illness-impacting-texas-kansas-dairy-cattle-confirmed-highly"/>; <author>; <name>;sklargh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=sklargh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.farmjournal.com/s3fs-public/styles/840x600/public/2024- 01/dairy%20cow%20web%20hero.jpeg" style="宽度：220px; height: 158px;" />;<br />;影响德克萨斯州、新墨西哥州和堪萨斯州奶牛群的疾病已被确定为禽流感 HPAI 菌株，该病毒由野生水禽传播，但不会对人类造成风险。奶牛显示采食量和产奶量减少，但不建议限制运动，牛奶仍然安全。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#illness-impacting-dairy-cattle-is-confirmed-as-高致病性禽流感" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39822476" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;喷墨打印机不仅仅用于打印</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/inkjet-printer</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T23:16:31.140291Z</更新>; <link href="https:// spectrum.ieee.org/inkjet-printer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/an-illustration-of-a-large-sheet-of-paper-with-various-icons-on-顶部.jpg?id=51814742&width=1200&height=776" style="width: 220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了喷墨打印从 20 世纪 80 年代初嘈杂的办公环境到现代安静打印机的演变，重点关注喷墨打印头的技术进步。还探讨了喷墨打印的多样化应用喷墨技术超越纸张打印，包括 DNA 微阵列、电路板和 3D 打印结构。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inkjets-are-for-more-than-just-printing" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39822222" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 的第一个张量处理单元：架构</stitle>; <id>;https: //thechipletter.substack.com/p/googles-first-tpu-architecture</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T23:16:31.140715Z</更新>; <link href="https://thechipletter.substack .com/p/googles-first-tpu-architecture"/>; <作者>; <名称>;c_joly</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=c_joly</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-s-first-tensor-processing-unit-architecture" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ZenHammer：对基于 AMD Zen 的 Rowhammer 攻击平台</stitle>; <id>;https://comsec.ethz.ch/research/dram/z​​enhammer/</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T19:16:31.141137Z</更新>; <link href=" https://comsec.ethz.ch/research/dram/z​​enhammer/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://comsec.ethz.ch/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/20240319_141734_ZenHammer-watermarked@2x-1024x495.png" 样式=“宽度：220px； height: 107px;" />;<br />;文章揭示，尽管有 TRR 缓解措施，AMD 系统仍容易受到 Rowhammer 攻击，与 Intel 系统类似，由于 AMD 的市场份额，影响重大。ZenHammer 是一种新工具，可以利用 DDR4 和DDR5 设备，表明需要进一步研究以保护 DRAM 免受此类漏洞的影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zenhammer-rowhammer-attacks-on-amd-zen-based-platforms" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39819599" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Tracecat – 开源安全警报自动化/SOAR 替代方案</stitle >; <id>;https://github.com/TracecatHQ/tracecat</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T18:16:31.141536Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/TracecatHQ /tracecat"/>; <author>; <name>;neochris</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=neochris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/46541035/315307510-52b822a9-fbd5-4f08-a4ec-54e8fd1b8f02.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ycRKdFrkXcgfdTY HbFMhfngBNsFh-gSRaFkdeRx3haE" style="宽度：220px ; height: 131px;" />;<br />;Tracecat 是一个处于公共 Alpha 阶段的开源安全自动化平台，提供云和自托管选项，旨在实现简单性和可访问性。它专为各种规模的团队而设计，重点关注人工智能功能和易用性，但尚不建议用于生产。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-tracecat-open-source-security-alert-automation-soar-alternative " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39819458" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;马丁·斯科塞斯作为一名痴迷的 VHS 档案管理员的秘密生活</stitle>; < id>;https://www.theguardian.com/film/2024/mar/25/martin-scorsese-vhs-video-collection-archive</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T20:16:31.141925Z</已更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2024/mar/25/martin-scorsese-vhs-video-collection-archive"/>; <作者>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk /img/media/54e1471d2f7e45b807bb572fcfcd648ddb0cb395/0_0_4032_3024/master/4032.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;高度：166px;" />;<br />;马丁·斯科塞斯收集了大量电影和电视节目的 VHS 磁带，用于个人观看和电影制作研究。这个独特的档案现在位于科罗拉多大学博尔德分校，深入了解他的创作过程和广播媒体的历史。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#martin-scorsese-s-secret-life-as-an-obsessive-vhs-archivist" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39815936" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Invertornot.com – 用于在暗模式下增强图像的 API </stitle>; <id>;https://invertornot.com</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T22:16:31.142318Z</更新>; <link href="https://invertornot.com"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mattismegevand</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mattismegevand</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://invertornot.com/static/examples.png" style="width: 220px; height: 87px;" />;<br />;InvertOrNot 提供免费的 API，帮助应用程序决定是否使用深度学习模型反转图像以获得更好的暗模式外观。它是开源的，强调用户隐私和用于图像保留控制的自托管选项。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-invertornot-com-api-to-enhance-your-images-in-dark-mode" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39821632" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;看到鱼了吗？按响铃</stitle>; <id>;https ://visdeurbel.nl/en/the-fish-doorbell/</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T16:16:31.142700Z</更新>; <link href="https://visdeurbel.nl/en /the-fish-doorbell/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cyanbane</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cyanbane</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;春天，鱼类在乌得勒支洄游，但关闭的船闸阻碍了它们；摄像头和直播让人们可以在鱼出现时发出信号以打开船闸。该倡议获得了全球支持，并通过新闻报道分享了鱼类的目击事件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#see-a-fish-ring-the-bell" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39800678" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;是时候剖析大英图书馆勒索软件噩梦了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2024/03/25/opinion_column/< /id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T22:16:31.143089Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2024/03/25/opinion_column/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jjgreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jjgreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// regmedia.co.uk/2023/12/01/library.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：152px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了 Rhysida 勒索软件攻击对大英图书馆的重大影响，强调图书馆发布的详细报告是 IT 风险管理的宝贵资源。它还与亚历山大图书馆相似，强调资源分配对破坏神话的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#time-to-examine-the-anatomy-of-the-british-library-ransomware-nightmare" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39814361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电子项目套件：亲自体验老式 160-in-1 (2016)</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /medium.com/@rxseger/Electronic-project-kits-hands-on-with-a-vintage-160-in-1-eea39e6193f4</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T19:16:31.143894Z</已更新>; <link href="https://medium.com/@rxseger/electronic-project-kits-hands-on-with-a-vintage-160-in-1-eea39e6193f4"/>; <作者>; <名称>; rwmj</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rwmj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro. medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1200/1*q3HtP57wlUqY7wbGLkLofA.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：167px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了现代电子学中的众多选择以及对简单时代的怀念，例如 20 世纪 80 年代提供结构化学习的电子项目套件。它还详细介绍了在线保存和共享这些老式套件手册的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#electronic-project-kits-hands-on-with-a-vintage-160-in-1-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39782261" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;丑陋的头像</stitle>; <id>;https://txstc55.github.io/ugly-avatar/</ id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T15:16:31.144277Z</更新>; <link href="https://txstc55.github.io/ugly-avatar/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;unobatbayar</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=unobatbayar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#ugly-avatar" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39813560" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：自动生成 OpenAPI 规范通过监听 localhost</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Adawg4/openapi-autospec</id>; <updated>;2024-03-25T17:16:31.144652Z</updated>; <link href=" https://github.com/Adawg4/openapi-autospec"/>; <作者>; <名称>;adawg4</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adawg4</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Adawg4/openapi-autospec/main/logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;OpenAPI AutoSpec 是一个本地服务器代理，可以根据网络请求自动创建 OpenAPI 规范，记录 API 行为，无需复杂的设置。它生成一个链接来捕获流量，并在执行操作后导出共享或外部使用的规范。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-auto-generate-an-openapi-spec-by-listening-to-localhost" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39817850" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Jampack – 作为后处理步骤优化静态网站</stitle>; <id >;https://github.com/divriots/jampack</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T15:16:31.145032Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/divriots/jampack" />; <author>; <name>;georges_gomes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=georges_gomes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://opengraph.githubassets.com/931d3c9eca74fd43091b1bf1daa773eae75e13a89669bc6d6ccae12da4dfa6ac/divriots/jampack”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;“Jampack”被描述为一种后处理工具，旨在优化静态站点生成器 (SSG) 的输出，以增强用户体验和卓越的 Core Web Vitals 分数。它执行关键的诸如内联关键 CSS、延迟加载其余 CSS、预取页面上的链接以加快未来页面导航以及在第二遍中压缩未触及的资源等任务。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #show-hn-jampack-optimizes-static-websites-as-a-post-processing-step" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=39816836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;两个具有出色架构文档的开源项目</stitle>; <id>;https://johnjago.com/great-docs/</id>; <updated>;2024-03-25T18:16： 31.145405Z</更新>; <link href="https://johnjago.com/great-docs/"/>; <作者>; <name>;johnjago</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=johnjago</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://johnjago.com/great-docs/esbuild-readme.png" style="width: 220px ; height: 225px;" />;<br />;文章强调了良好文档在软件项目中的重要性，以 esbuild 和 Redis 作为文档良好的开源项目的示例，可以增强理解和贡献。良好的文档可以节省时间，促进贡献，并且可以显着影响项目的成功。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#two-open-source-projects-with-great-architecture-documentation" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39819409" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;好友不允许好友导出为 CSV</stitle>; <id>;https://kaveland.no/friends -dont-let-friends-export-to-csv.html</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T18:16:31.145779Z</更新>; <link href="https://kaveland.no/friends- dont-let-friends-export-to-csv.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lervag</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lervag</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kaveland.no/images/face.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;作者反思了他们在数据科学中使用 CSV 文件的挑战性经历，列举了由于格式缺乏特异性而导致的数据损坏和低效解析等问题。他们提倡使用 Apache Parquet 等二进制格式，它提供更好的压缩、效率和模式自描述，使数据处理更加健壮和高性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#friends-don-t-let-friends-export-to -csv" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39814334" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Velox：Meta 的统一执行引擎 [pdf]</stitle >; <id>;https://www.eecs.umich.edu/courses/eecs584/static_files/papers/p3372-pedreira.pdf</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T17:16:31.146149Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.eecs.umich.edu/courses/eecs584/static_files/papers/p3372-pedreira.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文介绍了 Meta 创建的 Velox，这是一个开源 C++ 库，旨在统一跨各种引擎的数据处理通过提供高性能、可重复使用的组件。 Velox 通过提高效率、一致性和工程生产力来解决分散的数据系统环境。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#velox-meta-s-unified-execution-engine-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39805021" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用数学解决船员战斗策略</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alexirpan.com/2024/03/23/crew-battle.html< /id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T18:16:31.146524Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.alexirpan.com/2024/03/23/crew-battle.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;alexmolas</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexmolas</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;《任天堂明星大乱斗》中的船员战斗各队进行 1v1 比赛，直到其中一人耗尽玩家，这通常会凸显地区竞争。本文探讨了考虑角色匹配和玩家优势的最佳策略，并对问题进行了数学建模。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#solving-crew-battle-strategy-with-math" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39818825" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;委员会对 Alphabet、Apple 和 Meta 展开违规调查</stitle>; <id>;https://ec.europa.eu/commission/presscorner/detail/en/ ip_24_1689</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T11:16:31.146903Z</更新>; <link href="https://ec.europa.eu/commission/presscorner/detail/en/ip_24_1689"/>; <作者>; <name>;impish9208</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=impish9208</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://ec.europa.eu/commission/presscorner/assets/framework/images/logo/ec_logo.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;亮点、新闻稿和演讲 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#commission-opens-non-compliance-investigations-against-alphabet-apple-and-meta" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39814558" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;威廉·亚当斯：幕府将军的英国顾问</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.historytoday.com/archive/history-matters/william-adams-english-advisor-shogun</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T16:16:31.147286Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.historytoday.com/archive/history-matters/william-adams-english-advisor-shogun"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lermontov</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=lermontov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.historytoday.com/sites/default/files/2024-03/tokukawa_ieyasu_shogun_history_today-1 .jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：213px；" />;<br />;英国航海家威廉·亚当斯于1600年乘荷兰船抵达日本，获得德川家康的信任，升任旗本。他的知识和航海技能帮助结束了葡萄牙的贸易垄断并建立了荷兰和英国的贸易站。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#william-adams-english-advisor-to-the-shogun" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39796837" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;情侣如何见面</stitle>; <id>;https://web.stanford.edu/~mrosenfe/Rosenfeld_how_hetero_ Couples_met_through2021v4.JPG</id>; <更新>;2024- 03-25T23:16:31.147661Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.stanford.edu/~mrosenfe/Rosenfeld_how_hetero_ Couples_met_through2021v4.JPG"/>; <作者>; <名称>;yamrzou </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yamrzou</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how- Couples -meet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39822221" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C64 操作系统中的隐藏文件</stitle>; <id>; https://www.c64os.com/post/hiddenfiles</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T15:16:31.148059Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.c64os.com/post /hiddenfiles"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ingve</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/com.c64os.resources/buyersguide/featured/c64_os_v1.04_commercial_product_square.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文宣布发布 C64 OS 1.06 版，其中包括新的应用程序、实用程序和低级功能。还深入研究了 Commodore 计算机上文件管理和隐藏文件的复杂性. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hidden-files-in-c64-os" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39814271" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;俄亥俄州与债务相关的驾驶执照吊销</stitle>; <id>;https://www.clevelandfed.org/publications/cd-reports/2024/20240228-debt-lated -drivers-license-suspensions</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T13:16:31.148447Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.clevelandfed.org/publications/cd-reports/2024/ 20240228-debt-lated-drivers-license-suspensions"/>; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.clevelandfed.org/-/media/project/clevelandfedtenant/clevelandfedsite/publications/cd-reports/special-reports/20240228-债务相关- drivers-license-suspensions/fig1.jpg?extension=webp&w=991&hash=2AC5770035DCEE8FA1E6014DC62ACDA3" style="width: 220px; height: 203px;" />;<br />;俄亥俄州的驾驶执照吊销通常是因为未偿还债务，每年影响超过 170 万名司机。此类吊销可能会导致劳动力大幅减少，并对贫困社区造成不成比例的影响。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#debt-lated-drivers-license-suspensions-in-ohio" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=39815731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;黑客利用德国部长的双手照片伪造了她的指纹（2014）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2014/dec/30/hacker-fakes-german-部长指纹使用她手上的照片</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T22:16:31.148828Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/technology /2014/dec/30/hacker-fakes-german-ministers-fingerprints-using-photos-of-her-hands"/>; <author>; <name>;deegles</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=deegles</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/static/sys-images/Guardian /Pix/图片/2014/12/30/1419940788063/b361a9a9-c604-4612-b58f-a0f34dfec895-2060x1236.jpeg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;黑客演示了从高清照片克隆指纹，引发了对生物识别数据的安全担忧。研究人员建议使用生物识别作为辅助身份验证因素，而不是替代密码。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hacker-fakes-german-minister-s-fingerprints-using-photos-of-her-hands-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39821400" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Turbocall – Deno FFI 的即时编译器</stitle>; <id>;https://divy.work/turbocall.html< /id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T14:16:31.149197Z</更新>; <link href="https://divy.work/turbocall.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;undefined_void </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=undefined_void</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://divy.work/assets/turbocall -og.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Deno 使用 V8 Isolates 来优化外部函数接口 (FFI) 调用，通过为直接本机绑定调用提供类型信息来实现速度。Deno 使用基于 Rust 的汇编器来创建高效的绑定，提高 JavaScript 运行时的性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#turbocall-just-in-time-compiler-for-deno-ffi" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39813588" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 JTAG 转储并行 NOR 闪存</stitle>; <id>;https://zetier.com/news/ jtag-chain-diagram-to-dump-nor/</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T16:16:31.149575Z</更新>; <link href="https://zetier.com/news/jtag- chain-diagram-to-dump-nor/"/>; <author>; <name>;GrokNet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=GrokNet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://zetier.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/JTAG-Blog_thumbnail.png" style="width: 220px; height: 134px;" />;<br />;在找不到现有教程后，作者分享了如何使用免费软件和基本硬件读取并行 NOR 闪存的指南。他们为 Linux 和 Windows 用户提供了详细的过程，包括避免损坏芯片的预防措施。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-jtag-to-dump-parallel-nor-flash" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39800542" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inclusive Sans：专为可访问性和可读性而设计的文本字体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.oliviaking.com/ Included-sans</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T20:16:31.149950Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.oliviaking.com/inclusive-sans"/>; <作者>; <名称>;缺点</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=disadvantage</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images .squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/612aff4cebfe120cb873d540/1630810163171-GBF5HUCZCEVY77VAPHP2/InclusiveSans_Website.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Inclusive Sans 是一种专为提高可读性和可访问性而设计的字体，融合了视觉和认知便利性的功能。它在 Google 字体上提供常规和斜体版本，并支持原住民语言。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inclusive-sans-text-font-Design-for-accessibility-and-readability" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39820269" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;修复越野车街机</stitle>; <id>;https://philwip.com/2024/03/22/pcb-repair-speed-buggy -buggy-boy/</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T15:16:31.150325Z</更新>; <link href="https://philwip.com/2024/03/22/pcb-repair-speed -buggy-buggy-boy/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;countrymile</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=countrymile</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/philwip.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Buggy-A.jpg?resize=770%2C578&ssl=1" 样式= “宽度：220px； height: 166px;" />;<br />;作者讲述了通过追踪特定 IC 的故障来修复 Buggy Boy 街机游戏，包括通过更换二进制速率乘法器和 NAND 门解决的持续缩放问题。随后的老化测试证实修复的稳定性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#repairing-a-buggy-board-arcade-machine" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39798225" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Exosuit 肌肉控制更接近现实</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/function-electrical-stimulation-exosuit -project</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T11:16:31.150700Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/function-electrical-stimulation-exosuit-project"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“ https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/two-people-work-on-a-skull-with-a-device-attached-to-it.jpg?id=51772296&width=1200&height=800" style= “宽度：220px；高度：147px;" />;<br />;Synapsuit 是一款由韩国和瑞士研究人员开发的外装套装，旨在通过静电离合器来减轻用户疲劳，该静电离合器无需持续的肌肉刺激即可支撑关节。虽然前景光明，但该技术仍处于原型阶段阶段，预计到 2026 年将形成一个功能系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#exosuit-muscle-control-steps-closer-to-reality" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39814683" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;增加分配：向上还是向下？</stitle>; <id>;https://coredumped.dev/2024/03 /25/bump-allocation-up-or-down/</id>; <更新>;2024-03-25T13:16:31.151072Z</更新>; <link href="https://coredumped.dev/2024/03 /25/bump-allocation-up-or-down/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;celeritascelery</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=celeritascelery</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://coredumped.dev/images/bump/original.png" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;本文重新审视了碰撞分配器的分析，表明向上碰撞可能比向下碰撞更有效，特别是在与字大小对齐时。文章得出的结论是，向上碰撞具有快速重新分配等优点路径并适当对齐，可以成为最佳分配策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bump-allocation-up-or-down" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39815429" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
